content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 2.5, 2.5)
- Small electric pole (position 0.5, 1.5)

### Lab at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 3.5, 0.5) which is currently not powered.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 2.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)

### Copper cable factory at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position 3.5, 0.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new poles
- Ensure that you are not providing multiple values for the 'direction' argument when placing new poles. Check the function call to ensure that the parameters are being passed correctly.

### Errors when the lab is not powered
- Ensure that the lab is connected to a power source. Check the electricity generator and ensure that it is functioning properly to provide power to the lab.

### Errors when picking up obstructing entities
- Make sure to check the area around you for any obstructing entities before attempting to pick them up. This can prevent unnecessary actions and streamline your workflow.

### Errors when needing ingredients for research
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to complete research. In this case, make sure to gather enough automation science packs to complete the Automation research.
